text:
[Verse]
Counting stars in the night
Wishing on dreams so bright
Sky so wide moon so high
Heartbeats race time flies by

[Verse 2]
Feet on ground in the sand
Holding tight to your hand
Ocean waves touch our toes
Feel the love everyone knows

[Chorus]
We’re counting stars babe
Underneath this velvet sky
We’re counting stars babe
Together you and I

[Verse 3]
Whispers low shadows play
Chasing doubts far away
Hope’s alive in our eyes
Golden beams as sun rise

[Chorus]
We’re counting stars babe
Underneath this velvet sky
We’re counting stars babe
Together you and I

[Bridge]
Dreams we weave like a song
In the night where we belong
Drawing maps in the air
Finding love everywhere
title: Counting Stars
